modName: Map Of Skyrim In The Dark - HD Main Menu Replacer
summary: This replacer is similar to my previous one 'Alduin's Wall In The Dark'. When the mist comes, the map of Skyrim can be visible behind the imperial dragon symbol. The symbol is also replaced with a higher quality one in two metallic variations. [Iron, Silver]
descriptionHtml:
Greetings!

This replacer is similar to my previous one 'Alduin's Wall In The Dark'. When the mist comes, the map of Skyrim can be visible behind the imperial dragon symbol. The symbol is also replaced with a higher quality one in two metallic variations. [Iron, Silver]
Cheers!

INSTALLATION:
Extract the files into your Skyrim Folder.
author: Silverloom
